string-array.name: wifi_diag_err_wifi_base
string-array.item: "Couldn't turn on Wi-Fi. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Couldn't locate hotspot. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Can't turn on Wi-Fi. Turn Wi-Fi off and on again or reboot your router."
Wi-Fi has disconnected repeatedly. Turn Wi-Fi off and on again or reboot your router.
"Couldn't turn on hotspot. Reboot your device or update it to the latest system version."
"Couldn't turn on hotspot. Turn off Airplane mode and try again."

"Couldn't turn on hotspot. Turn off Airplane mode and try again."
